title: The Fall of Investment Platforms - Are Investors Protected in Bankruptcy?

media:group.media:title: The Fall of Investment Platforms - Are Investors Protected in Bankruptcy?
media:group.media:description:
This video is sponsored by The Daily Upside - use the following link to sign up for the high-quality business and finance newsletter: https://bit.ly/3yJM8QI

Coffeezilla's video on Voyager: https://youtu.be/uZYMtVBXUrE

00:00 - Intro
01:29 - Chapter 7 Bankruptcy
03:26 - Chapter 11 Bankruptcy
04:21 - Impact on Investors
05:56 - Protections for Pensions, Brokers and Banks
08:50 - Crypto Brokers
10:00 - Legal Shenanigans (Voyager)
12:02 - Closing Remarks

Crypto platforms are starting to file for bankruptcy, and investors want to know if their funds are safe. We'll dive into what protections exist, and which ones don't, in today's video.
